com.mousebird.maply

Interface QuadImageTileLayer.TileSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultiplexTileSource, RemoteTileSource, TestImageSource
    Enclosing class:
    QuadImageTileLayer

    public static interface QuadImageTileLayer.TileSource
    The Tile Source is the interface used to actually fetch individual images for tiles. You fill this in to provide data for remote or local tile queries.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int maxZoom()
      The maximum zoom level you'll be called about to create a tile for.
      int minZoom()
      The minimum zoom level you'll be called about to create a tile for.
      int pixelsPerSide()
      The number of pixels square for each tile.
      void startFetchForTile(QuadImageTileLayerInterface layer, MaplyTileID tileID, int frame)
      This tells you when to start fetching a given tile.

    • Method Detail

      • minZoom

        int minZoom()
        The minimum zoom level you'll be called about to create a tile for.

      • maxZoom

        int maxZoom()
        The maximum zoom level you'll be called about to create a tile for.

      • pixelsPerSide

        int pixelsPerSide()
        The number of pixels square for each tile.

      • startFetchForTile

        void startFetchForTile(QuadImageTileLayerInterface layer,
                     MaplyTileID tileID,
                     int frame)
        This tells you when to start fetching a given tile. When you've fetched the image you'll want to call loadedTile(). If you fail to fetch an image call that with nil.
        Parameters:
        layer - The layer asking for the fetch.
        tileID - The tile ID to fetch.
        frame - If the source support multiple frames, this is the frame. Otherwise -1.
